T02TD1509E:275b-1: l'u yi p'a d'a bhi sa ma ya barti samba ro dya n'a ma /
T02TD1509E:275b-3: l'u yi ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1509E:275b-4: dpal ldan l'u yi pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1509E:275b-5: b'a r'a rlung dang me dag gis //
T02TD1509E:275b-6: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ham //
T02TD1509E:275b-7: gang gis zhu byed b'a r'a hi //
T02TD1509E:275b-9: 'di mnga'i ston pa 'gro ba dag dang gnyis med bdag / shes rab ma yi khams ldan bde ba chen po'i bdag / shes rab thugs rje dbyer med nam mkha' lta bu'i bdag / de nyid sgrub thabs de sgom byed pa bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1509E:275b-10: dang por ri spyil la sogs par //
T02TD1509E:275b-11: lho phyogs kha bstan rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1509E:275b-12: skra grol ro la 'dud nas ni //
T02TD1509E:275b-13: bdud rtsi lnga po khar bcug la //
T02TD1509E:275b-14: shr'i he ru ka zhes yig don //
T02TD1509E:275b-15: bsam zhing sdom pa'i tshul du bsgyur //
T02TD1509E:275b-16: a'a li k'a li'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1509E:275b-17: bgegs bsregs tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom //
T02TD1509E:275b-18: gzugs la rgyal pa rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1509E:275b-19: tshor ba rdo rje nyi mar bsgom //
T02TD1509E:275b-21: rdo rje rgyal po 'du byed la //
T02TD1509E:275b-22: rnam shes phung po rdo rje can ;
T02TD1509E:275b-23: / thams cad stong nyid he ru ka'o //
T02TD1509E:275b-24: rim par dpral ba lte ba mgrin //
T02TD1509E:275b-25: rkang pa snying dang spyi bor ro //
T02TD1509E:275b-26: gti mug rdo rje mig dag la //
T02TD1509E:275b-27: zhe sdang dag byed snyan gnyis la //
T02TD1509E:275b-28: sna la ser sna gsod byed ma //
T02TD1509E:275b-29: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ste //
T02TD1509E:275b-30: phrag dog rdo rje lus dpral la //
T02TD1509E:275b-31: byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sbyin //
T02TD1509E:275b-32: skye mched rnams kyi rang snying la'o //
T02TD1509E:275b-33: sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma //
T02TD1509E:275b-34: chu yi khams ni gsod byed ma //
T02TD1509E:275b-35: me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma /
T02TD1509E:275b-36: rlung khams gar gyi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1509E:275b-37: nam mkha'i rang bzhin pad 'bar ma //
T02TD1509E:275b-38: 'di rnams rim pas lte ba snying //
T02TD1509E:275b-39: mgrin pa dpral ba gsang gnas su //
T02TD1509E:275b-40: yang na gzugs la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1509E:275b-41: gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du bsam //
T02TD1509E:275b-42: de nas g-yon pa'i mtheb mdzub kyis //
T02TD1509E:275b-43: se gol gtogs pa sngon btang nas //
T02TD1509E:276a-2: rtse gcig rnal 'byor brjod pa yis //
T02TD1509E:276a-3: nag po ljang gu dmar po ser //
T02TD1509E:276a-4: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod //
T02TD1509E:276a-5: sa 'og tshangs pa'i gnas bar du //
T02TD1509E:276a-6: khyab pa'i lus chen 'bar ba rnams //
T02TD1509E:276a-8: ra ba bzhi po de bzhin bsam //
T02TD1509E:276a-9: h'um byung nges mtshan rdo rje yi //
T02TD1509E:276a-10: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin sa //
T02TD1509E:276a-12: rdo rje rtse lngar gyur pa yi //
T02TD1509E:276a-13: ra ba rnams steng mda' dra ba //
T02TD1509E:276a-14: de yi 'og tu rdo rje'i gur //
T02TD1509E:276a-15: de 'og rdo rje bla re yang //
T02TD1509E:276a-16: rang rang sngags kyis bsam par bya //
T02TD1509E:276a-17: khva gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi //
T02TD1509E:276a-18: gsang sngags bzhi las byung ba dang //
T02TD1509E:276a-19: gnyis gnyis phyogs 'od las byung ba //
T02TD1509E:276a-20: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs bzhi //
T02TD1509E:276a-21: zhal gcig phyag gnyis de rnams brgyad //
T02TD1509E:276a-22: lte ba man chad phur pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1509E:276a-23: de rnams g-yon na phur bu ni //
T02TD1509E:276a-24: de dang de yi dang tshul can //
T02TD1509E:276a-25: g-yas pa'i lag pa rnams na ni //
T02TD1509E:276a-27: 'phros te song bas phyogs bcu na //
T02TD1509E:276a-28: gnas pa'i bgegs rnams rab bkug nas //
T02TD1509E:276a-29: h'um ring brjod 'byung phyogs brgyad kyi //
T02TD1509E:276a-30: khron par de rnams rab bcug nas //
T02TD1509E:276a-31: gdab pa'i sngags kyis phur bus gdab //
T02TD1509E:276a-32: brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdung bya ste //
T02TD1509E:276a-33: gdab dang brdung pa dag gis ni //
T02TD1509E:276a-34: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig 'gyur //
T02TD1509E:276a-35: bgegs kyi lhag ma rnams bskrad nas //
T02TD1509E:276a-36: ra ba la thim lha mo rnams //
T02TD1509E:276a-37: chu la chu ni 'bab ba bzhin //
T02TD1509E:276a-38: mtshams kyi bcings pa'i phyir byung ba //
T02TD1509E:276a-40: ra ba rnams kyang bsam par bya //
T02TD1509E:276a-41: gsang sngags rnams ni 'di lta ste //
T02TD1509E:276a-42: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-43: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-44: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-45: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'an badzra r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-46: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'a na h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-47: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-48: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sarba bi ght'am k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-49: aom badzra mudga ra badzra k'i la ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:276a-50: de nas snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1509E:276a-51: de yi steng du h'um yig 'od zer dang ldan bsam byas nas //
T02TD1509E:276b-0: de yi 'od kyis bkug nas mdun du @276b dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1509E:276b-1: phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun dang bdag nyid dbul bar bya //
T02TD1509E:276b-2: he ru ka zhes spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru //
T02TD1509E:276b-3: rim pas bltas te stong pa nyid bsgom gsang sngags brjod //
T02TD1509E:276b-4: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dmar'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1509E:276b-5: sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis rang sems aom sogs gyur //
T02TD1509E:276b-6: de las 'od dang 'khor lo'i 'phro dang 'du ba bsam //
T02TD1509E:276b-7: de nas rang sems de yang rab tu snang ba tsam //
T02TD1509E:276b-8: de yang gsang sngags brjod cing stong pa nyid du bsgom //
T02TD1509E:276b-9: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1509E:276b-10: stong pa'i ngang las langs te yam yig las byung ba //
T02TD1509E:276b-11: de la rlung gi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom bya ste //
T02TD1509E:276b-12: sdo skya gzhu yi dbyibs can mtha' ma ba dan mtshan //
T02TD1509E:276b-13: de yi steng du ram yig las byung me'i dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1509E:276b-14: rtse mo bdun ldan dmar po gru gsum ram gyis mtshan //
T02TD1509E:276b-15: de steng bam yig las byung chu yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1509E:276b-16: dkar po shin tu zlum po bum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1509E:276b-17: de steng lam yig las byung sa yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1509E:276b-18: ser po gru gsum rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1509E:276b-19: de steng sum yig las byung ri rab lhun po ste //
T02TD1509E:276b-20: lcog brgyad ldan pa gling la sogs pas bskor ba dang //
T02TD1509E:276b-21: grva bzhi ngos bzhi rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1509E:276b-22: de steng padma'i steng du h'um byung sna tshogs rdor //
T02TD1509E:276b-23: de steng pam yig las byung sna tshogs padma ste //
T02TD1509E:276b-24: 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar lte ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1509E:276b-25: de steng a'a li k'a li las byung nyi zla'o //
T02TD1509E:276b-27: de la h'um yig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1509E:276b-28: rang gi 'od zer 'phros pas 'khor lo lnga po yis //
T02TD1509E:276b-29: 'gro ba'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin byas nas rnal 'byor mar //
T02TD1509E:276b-30: bcas pa'i 'khor lo slar yang bsdus te bsgom par bya //
T02TD1509E:276b-31: zhes bya ba rjes su rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1509E:276b-32: h'um la sogs pa las bskyed nyi ma'i 'khor lor gnas //
T02TD1509E:276b-33: he ru ka dpal nam mkha' bzhin du rang bzhin med //
T02TD1509E:276b-34: rtag pa'i dbang phyug chad pa'i au ma de wa la //
T02TD1509E:276b-35: brkyang bskum g-yas g-yon gnas pa zhal kun spyan gsum ldan //
T02TD1509E:276b-36: 'khor lo dur khrod dang ldan gzhal yas khang gi nang //
T02TD1509E:276b-37: mthing nag ljang gu dmar po ser po'i kha dog can //
T02TD1509E:276b-38: zhal bzhi dbu la rdo rje phreng ldan phyag bcu gnyis //
T02TD1509E:276b-39: rdo rje dril bu gnyis bcas phyag gis yum la 'khyud //
T02TD1509E:277a-0: gti mug dag phyir glang po'i pags pa @277a * //
T02TD1509E:277a-2: g-yas pa rim pas d'a ma ru dang dgra sta gri gug rtse gsum 'dzin //
T02TD1509E:277a-3: g-yon pas kha tv'am ga dang thod pa zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams //
T02TD1509E:277a-4: dbu la zla ba phyed pa thod pa'i phreng ba sna tshogs rdo rje can //
T02TD1509E:277a-5: mche ba rab tu gtsigs shing zhal 'gyur ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan //
T02TD1509E:277a-6: blo ldan bsam gtan sbyor bas nyams kun dang ldan pa //
T02TD1509E:277a-7: nyon mongs dri ma dag phyir stag gi pags pa bsnams //
T02TD1509E:277a-8: a'a li la sogs lnga bcu rnam par dag pa yis //
T02TD1509E:277a-9: mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal dang ldan pa //
T02TD1509E:277a-10: mgul rgyan snyan rgyan gdub kor spyi gtsug nor bu dang //
T02TD1509E:277a-11: tshangs sku dang ldan thal bas byugs pa du ba'i mdog / phag mo mgon po'i mdun gnas nyi ma lta bur ni //
T02TD1509E:277a-12: mdog dmar thod pa skam po'i phreng ba'i do shal can //
T02TD1509E:277a-13: zhal gcig ma dang spyan gsum phyag gnyis dang ldan ma //
T02TD1509E:277a-14: gcer bu bde ba'i ngang tshul bkra grol rab dgyes ma //
T02TD1509E:277a-15: thod pa'i dum bu las byas ske rags dang ldan ma //
T02TD1509E:277a-16: g-yon pa bdud khrag bkang pa'i thod pa bsnams pa ste //
T02TD1509E:277a-17: g-yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis //
T02TD1509E:277a-18: phyogs bcu'i gdug pa rnams 'joms byed //
T02TD1509E:277a-19: bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid che //
T02TD1509E:277a-20: khrag la dgyes shing khrag 'dzag ma //
T02TD1509E:277a-21: brla gnyis la ni rab tu 'khyud //
T02TD1509E:277a-22: bde chen snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1509E:277a-24: khanda ro he gzugs can ma //
T02TD1509E:277a-26: de rnams dngos grub thams cad bsgrub //
T02TD1509E:277a-27: nag mo ljang gu dmar mo ser //
T02TD1509E:277a-28: zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi ba rnams //
T02TD1509E:277a-29: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga /d'a ma ru dang gri gug g-yas //
T02TD1509E:277a-30: spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba //
T02TD1509E:277a-31: gcer bu brkyang bskum gnas pa rnams //
T02TD1509E:277a-32: phyogs mtshams rnams su bum steng du //
T02TD1509E:277a-33: byang chub sems sogs snod rnams so //
T02TD1509E:277a-34: dang por thugs 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa //
T02TD1509E:277a-35: mthing nag rdo rje phreng bas bskor ;
T02TD1509E:277a-36: / de shar p'ull'i ra m'a lar //
T02TD1509E:277a-37: rab gtum khanda ka p'a lar //
T02TD1509E:277a-38: de byang dz'a landha ra ru //
T02TD1509E:277a-39: ma h'a kangka gtum mig can //
T02TD1509E:277a-40: nub kyi ao di ya na ru //
T02TD1509E:277a-42: lho phyogs aarbu da ru ni //
T02TD1509E:277a-43: sna chen mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
T02TD1509E:277a-44: me mtshams go d'a aa ba r'ir //
T02TD1509E:277b-0: su ra @277b bee ri dpa' blo can //
T02TD1509E:277b-1: bden bral r'a me shva ra ru //
T02TD1509E:277b-2: 'od dpag med dang mi thung ma //
T02TD1509E:277b-3: de b'i ko ta rlung mtshams su //
T02TD1509E:277b-4: lang ka dbang phyug rdo rje 'od //
T02TD1509E:277b-5: dbang ldan mtshams su m'a la bar //
T02TD1509E:277b-6: rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ma //
T02TD1509E:277b-7: gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po ste //
T02TD1509E:277b-8: padma dmar po'i phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1509E:277b-9: shar ngos rtsibs kyi k'a ma r'ur //
T02TD1509E:277b-10: aangku ri dang aee ra ba //
T02TD1509E:277b-11: byang du ao tar 'jigs byed che //
T02TD1509E:277b-12: de dang rdo rje'i ral pa can //
T02TD1509E:277b-13: nub kyi tri sha ku ne ru //
T02TD1509E:277b-14: dpa' bo che dang rlung shugs ma //
T02TD1509E:277b-15: lho yi ko sa la ru ni //
T02TD1509E:277b-16: rdo rje h'um mdzad chang 'thung ma'o //
T02TD1509E:277b-17: me yi mtshams kyi ka ling gar //
T02TD1509E:277b-18: shya ma de bi rab tu bzang //
T02TD1509E:277b-19: bden bral mtshams su lam p'a kar //
T02TD1509E:277b-20: rdor bzang shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02TD1509E:277b-21: rlung gi mtshams kyi k'anytsi ru //
T02TD1509E:277b-23: de bzhin dbang ldan hi m'a lar //
T02TD1509E:277b-24: mig mi bzang dang khag na'o //
T02TD1509E:277b-25: sku yi 'khor lo dkar po ste //
T02TD1509E:277b-26: 'khor lo'i phreng ba dkar pos bskor //
T02TD1509E:277b-27: shar rtsibs pre ta pu ri ru //
T02TD1509E:277b-28: stobs chen 'khor lo'i shugs can ma //
T02TD1509E:277b-29: byang gi gri ha de ba t'ar //
T02TD1509E:277b-30: rin chen rdo rje du ma skyes ma //
T02TD1509E:277b-31: nub kyi rtsibs la soo r'ashtar //
T02TD1509E:277b-32: rta mgrin dang ni shoo ndi n'i //
T02TD1509E:277b-33: lho ru warna dra'i pa ru //
T02TD1509E:277b-34: 'khor lo'i go cha nam mkha'i snying //
T02TD1509E:277b-35: me yi mtshams kyi na ga rar //
T02TD1509E:277b-36: he ru ka dpal su b'i ri //
T02TD1509E:277b-38: dbang phyug dang ni stobs chen mo //
T02TD1509E:277b-39: rlung mtshams ma rur rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1509E:277b-41: dbang ldan mtshams kyi ku lu t'a ra //
T02TD1509E:277b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' brtson chen mo //
T02TD1509E:277b-43: dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1509E:277b-44: brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas 'khyud //
T02TD1509E:277b-45: g-yas dang g-yon da ma ru dang kha tv'am ga / dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan spyan gsum ldan //
T02TD1509E:277b-46: rab gtum la sogs lha mo rnams //
T02TD1509E:277b-47: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02TD1509E:277b-48: thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag gis 'khyud //
T02TD1509E:277b-49: gdug pa 'jigs byed gri gug bsnams //
T02TD1509E:277b-50: gnyis med sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug / dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo bzhin //
T02TD1509E:277b-51: khva 'ug khyi phag gdong can ma //
T02TD1509E:277b-52: mkha' 'gro sogs bzhin phyogs bzhi ru //
T02TD1509E:277b-53: mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma sogs //
T02TD1509E:278a-2: de rnams zhal gcig phyag bzhi ba //
T02TD1509E:278a-3: brkyang bskum ro yi gdan la gnas //
T02TD1509E:278a-4: g-yon na thod pa kha tv'am ga /da ma ru dang gri gug g-yas //
T02TD1509E:278a-5: thams cad spyan gsum drag mo ste //
T02TD1509E:278a-6: skra grol gcer bu de rnams so //
T02TD1509E:278a-7: mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang //
T02TD1509E:278a-8: rna rgyan dang ni tshangs skud dang //
T02TD1509E:278a-9: thams cad phyag rgya lnga dang ldan //
T02TD1509E:278a-10: dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng bas dkris //
T02TD1509E:278a-11: thod pa'i phreng bas mgrin par brgyan //
T02TD1509E:278a-12: ske rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD1509E:278a-13: shar dang dbang ldan dbu byas te //
T02TD1509E:278a-14: thams cad phyogs dang mtshams rnams su //
T02TD1509E:278a-15: dur khrod rnal 'byor ma dgod la ;
T02TD1509E:278a-16: / g-yon dang g-yas su bskor bar bya //
T02TD1509E:278a-17: shar gyi dur khrod gtum drag na //
T02TD1509E:278a-18: shi ri sha yi sdong chen dang //
T02TD1509E:278a-19: brgya byin rab brtan la bcibs pa //
T02TD1509E:278a-20: gser mdog rdo rje thod pa bsnams //
T02TD1509E:278a-21: nor rgyas klu yi rgyal po yang //
T02TD1509E:278a-22: mdog dkar autpala sngon pos mtshan //
T02TD1509E:278a-23: thal mo spya bar byas pa yis ;
T02TD1509E:278a-24: /'dud cir mgon po'i mdun na gnas //
T02TD1509E:278a-25: byang du tshang tshing aa shvatthar //
T02TD1509E:278a-26: lus ngan mi la zhon pa ste //
T02TD1509E:278a-27: ne'u le rin chen skyugs pa dang //
T02TD1509E:278a-28: thod pa 'chang ba sku mdog ser //
T02TD1509E:278a-31: mgos btud thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1509E:278a-32: nub tu 'bar bas khyab pa ru //
T02TD1509E:278a-33: aa sho ka yi sdong chen la //
T02TD1509E:278a-34: dkar po gdengs bdun ba ru na //
T02TD1509E:278a-35: chu srin la gnas thod zhags 'dzin //
T02TD1509E:278a-36: lto 'phye'i dbang du phyug karko ta //
T02TD1509E:278a-37: d'ur ba sngon po lta bu'i mdog / ri mo gsum ni mgrin par gnas //
T02TD1509E:278a-38: 'dud nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar //
T02TD1509E:278a-39: lho ru 'jigs rung la aa mrar //
T02TD1509E:278a-40: gshin rje ma he zhon pa ste //
T02TD1509E:278a-41: nag po mig dmar lus sbom po //
T02TD1509E:278a-42: drag po be con thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1509E:278a-43: gdengs ldan dbang phyug padma zhes //
T02TD1509E:278a-44: ston pa yi ni bka' sdod cing //
T02TD1509E:278a-45: dkar po thal mo sbyar byas pa //
T02TD1509E:278a-46: dbul thig le mang pos mtshan //
T02TD1509E:278a-47: ha ha dgod pa dbang ldan du //
T02TD1509E:278a-48: n+ya gro dha yi sdong chen po //
T02TD1509E:278a-49: dbang phyug rtse gsum thod pa thogs //
T02TD1509E:278a-50: dkar po glang zhon stag sham can //
T02TD1509E:278a-51: padma chen po klu yi rgyal //
T02TD1509E:278a-52: zla ba'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i mdog / gdengs ka la ni rtse gsum mtshan //
T02TD1509E:278a-53: mgo la thal mo sbyar bas gnas //
T02TD1509E:278b-0: me mtshams dpal nags @278b ka ram dzar //
T02TD1509E:278b-1: me lha bong thung ra skyes bcibs //
T02TD1509E:278b-2: sku mdog dmar po thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1509E:278b-3: phreng pa spyi blugs bcas pa bsnams //
T02TD1509E:278b-4: mtha' yas rma bya'i mgrin pa bzhin //
T02TD1509E:278b-5: mgo la padmas mtshan pa ste //
T02TD1509E:278b-6: spyi bor thal mo sbyar gyur nas //
T02TD1509E:278b-7: 'dud cing mgon po'i zhabs drung gnas //
T02TD1509E:278b-8: bden bral mun pa mi bzad par //
T02TD1509E:278b-9: srin po gcer bu sngon po'i mdog / ro gnas ral gri thod pa 'dzin //
T02TD1509E:278b-10: mi mgo'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
T02TD1509E:278b-11: klu rgyal dung mdog rigs ldan ni //
T02TD1509E:278b-12: gdengs ka zla ba phyed pas mtshan //
T02TD1509E:278b-13: spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02TD1509E:278b-14: la ta dza da'i shing la gnas //
T02TD1509E:278b-15: rlung mtshams aa rdzun yi shing //
T02TD1509E:278b-16: rlung lha du mdog sha ba bcibs //
T02TD1509E:278b-17: ba dan ser po thod pa 'chang //
T02TD1509E:278b-18: ca co sgrogs par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1509E:278b-19: dung skyong ser po thig les mtshan //
T02TD1509E:278b-20: thal sbyar gus dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1509E:278b-21: brgyad po klu rgyal sprin la gnas //
T02TD1509E:278b-22: dkar po rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1509E:278b-23: brgya byin la sogs phyogs bdag brgyad //
T02TD1509E:278b-24: yum dang bcas pa phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1509E:278b-25: gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba ste //
T02TD1509E:278b-26: lhag ma dag gis phyag mtshan bsnams //
T02TD1509E:278b-27: sprin rnams rgyal bzang dpal stug dang //
T02TD1509E:278b-28: de bzhin char dang shin tu mthug / myur du dbyangs ldan gtum pa dang //
T02TD1509E:278b-29: char pa rnying pa tsab krol lo ;
T02TD1509E:278b-30: / de brgyad dur khrod brgyad rnams na //
T02TD1509E:278b-31: gnas pa'i sprin ni 'jigs byed ldan //
T02TD1509E:278b-32: glog dang 'brug ni sgra rab sgrogs //
T02TD1509E:278b-33: gang yang rung ba'i char rgyun 'bebs //
T02TD1509E:278b-34: rang rang phyogs bdag gzhom pa'i gdong //
T02TD1509E:278b-35: srin po rnams ni rang bzhin 'khrug / mi rnams kyi ni sha za zhing //
T02TD1509E:278b-36: khrag 'thung zhing rnams la gnas pa //
T02TD1509E:278b-37: 'di rnams shing sdong brgyad pa yi //
T02TD1509E:278b-38: ngos dang ngos kyi phyogs kun du //
T02TD1509E:278b-39: nye bar bzang po'i shing rnams gnas //
T02TD1509E:278b-40: me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1509E:278b-41: seng ge ce sbyang khyi sgra sgrogs //
T02TD1509E:278b-42: stag dang wa dang phag rnams dang //
T02TD1509E:278b-43: byi la rkyang dang bri ka sbrul //
T02TD1509E:278b-44: khva dang 'ug pa la sogs bya //
T02TD1509E:278b-45: gsal shing bskyon dang mdung gis phug / keng rus phyed mgo rus pa rnams //
T02TD1509E:278b-46: thab tu tshig dang phyed tshig pa //
T02TD1509E:278b-47: sha za dang ni ro sgrub byed //
T02TD1509E:278b-48: grub thog gtor ma ster ba dang //
T02TD1509E:278b-49: rnal 'byor ma tshogs mchod pa dang //
T02TD1509E:279a-0: gri grug thod pa kha tv'am ga / rde'u @279a * //
T02TD1509E:279a-1: chung kha zas dpag med snod //
T02TD1509E:279a-2: mchod rten dkar po'i ri la gnas //
T02TD1509E:279a-3: grub chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1509E:279a-4: rnam shes brgyad kyi dag pa yang //
T02TD1509E:279a-5: ston pa 'di yi dur khrod rnams //
T02TD1509E:279a-6: de nas byang chub phyogs rnams dang //
T02TD1509E:279a-7: sku yi 'khor lo'i phyogs bshad bya //
T02TD1509E:279a-8: gnas sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1509E:279a-9: sa bcu rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1509E:279a-10: p'u dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a /
T02TD1509E:279a-11: k'a ao tri ko ka la ki hi /
T02TD1509E:279a-12: pre gri soo su na si ma ku zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1509E:279a-13: snying la mkha' 'gro lus rjes dran //
T02TD1509E:279a-14: tshor dran mgo bor l'a ma ste //
T02TD1509E:279a-15: chos dran mgrin par du ma skyes ma //
T02TD1509E:279a-16: lte bar sems dran gzugs can ma'o //
T02TD1509E:279a-17: mgo bo pull'i ra m'a lar //
T02TD1509E:279a-19: spyi gtsug grong khyer dz'a landha ra //
T02TD1509E:279a-20: brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul gtum pa'i mig / dbu rgyan g-yas pa'i rna ba la //
T02TD1509E:279a-22: mgo yi rgyab kyi aarbu d'ar //
T02TD1509E:279a-23: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul sna chen mo //
T02TD1509E:279a-24: gnas de sa rab dga' ba'o //
T02TD1509E:279a-25: go d'a ba r'i g-yon pa'i rnar //
T02TD1509E:279a-26: dad pa'i dbang po dpa' blo ma //
T02TD1509E:279a-27: r'a me shva r'i smin mtshams su //
T02TD1509E:279a-28: brtson 'grus dbang po mi thung ma //
T02TD1509E:279a-29: de b'i ko tar mig dag la //
T02TD1509E:279a-30: langka'i dbang phyug dran dbang po //
T02TD1509E:279a-31: m'a la bar ni sdong sgrib ma //
T02TD1509E:279a-32: ting 'dzin dbang po dri med pa //
T02TD1509E:279a-33: phrag pa dag ste nye ba'i gnas //
T02TD1509E:279a-35: aee ra ba ti k'a ma r'ur //
T02TD1509E:279a-36: shes rab dbang po mchan khung gnyis //
T02TD1509E:279a-37: nu ma gnyis la dad pa'i stobs //
T02TD1509E:279a-38: 'jigs byed chen mo ao tre ru //
T02TD1509E:279a-39: zhing dang sa gsum 'od byed ma //
T02TD1509E:279a-40: brtson 'grus stobs ni rlung shugs ma ;
T02TD1509E:279a-41: / lte ba tri sha ku ne ru //
T02TD1509E:279a-42: dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma //
T02TD1509E:279a-43: ko sa lar ni sna rtse ste //
T02TD1509E:279a-45: ting nge 'dzin stobs kha ru ni //
T02TD1509E:279a-46: shy'a ma de bi ka linggar //
T02TD1509E:279a-47: shin tu bzang mo lamb'a kar //
T02TD1509E:279a-48: mgrin par shes rab stobs dang ni //
T02TD1509E:279a-49: sa sbyang dka' ba tshando ha //
T02TD1509E:279a-50: byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1509E:279a-51: rta rna k'anytsi snying gar gnas //
T02TD1509E:279a-52: hi m'a la ya mdoms su ni //
T02TD1509E:279a-53: brtson 'grus yang dag kha ga na //
T02TD1509E:279a-54: mngon gyur nye ba'i tshando ha //
T02TD1509E:279a-55: gsung gi 'khor lo longs spyod pa //
T02TD1509E:279a-56: dga' ba pre ta pur rtags la //
T02TD1509E:279a-57: 'khor lo'i shugs can bshang lam du //
T02TD1509E:279b-0: gri ha @279b do bar shin tu sbyangs //
T02TD1509E:279b-1: khanda ro h'a ring du song //
T02TD1509E:279b-2: sa ste 'du ba can gyi gnas //
T02TD1509E:279b-3: brla gnyis chos rab rnam par 'byed //
T02TD1509E:279b-5: byin gnyis 'khor lo'i go cha ma //
T02TD1509E:279b-6: su warnna dv'i par dran yang dag / mi g-yo'i sa ste nyer 'du can //
T02TD1509E:279b-7: btang snyoms byang chub yan lag ni //
T02TD1509E:279b-8: sor mo dpa' mo na gar //
T02TD1509E:279b-9: sindhu rkang pa'i bol dag la'o //
T02TD1509E:279b-10: yang dag lta ba stobs chen mo //
T02TD1509E:279b-11: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros sa //
T02TD1509E:279b-12: 'khor los sgyur ma yang dag rtog / mthe bong ma ru brtson chen mo //
T02TD1509E:279b-13: pus mo ku lu t'a yang dag / nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin //
T02TD1509E:279b-14: sku yi sa 'og gnas spyod pa'o //
T02TD1509E:279b-15: las mtha' kha gdong kha la gnas //
T02TD1509E:279b-17: rtsol ba khyi gdong rna bug g-yas //
T02TD1509E:279b-18: dran pa phag gdong bshang lam du //
T02TD1509E:279b-19: shr'i he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD1509E:279b-20: gshin rje brtan ma rna ba g-yas //
T02TD1509E:279b-21: dge chos skyed par byed pa'o //
T02TD1509E:279b-22: skyes pa'i dge ba srung byed pa //
T02TD1509E:279b-23: shin rje pho nya rna ba g-yon //
T02TD1509E:279b-24: mi dge thams cad spong byed pa //
T02TD1509E:279b-25: mig g-yas gshin rje mche ba ma //
T02TD1509E:279b-26: mi dge ma skyes mi skyed pa //
T02TD1509E:279b-27: gshin rje 'joms ma mig g-yon la //
T02TD1509E:279b-29: bhee ram pa ni gzhu yi dbyibs //
T02TD1509E:279b-30: sum mdo'i phyogs su gnas pa ni //
T02TD1509E:279b-31: gru gsum me yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1509E:279b-32: zlum po'i rnam pa'i tshul can gyi //
T02TD1509E:279b-33: chu yi 'khor lo gsum par gnas //
T02TD1509E:279b-34: snying gar sa yi 'khor lo gnas //
T02TD1509E:279b-35: gru bzhi pa ni kun phyogs su //
T02TD1509E:279b-36: sgal tshigs dbyu gu'i tshul du ni //
T02TD1509E:279b-37: de bzhin ri rgyal ltun po ste //
T02TD1509E:279b-38: de yi spyi gtsug dkyil du yang //
T02TD1509E:279b-39: pad 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis pa //
T02TD1509E:279b-40: dbyangs yig gsal yig yang dag gang //
T02TD1509E:279b-41: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu gnyis //
T02TD1509E:279b-42: padma'i dbus na yod pa gang //
T02TD1509E:279b-43: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la brjod //
T02TD1509E:279b-44: mgo bo'i dbus na yod pa gang //
T02TD1509E:279b-45: de la klad pa zhes brjod de //
T02TD1509E:279b-46: de yi dbus su ham yig ste ;
T02TD1509E:279b-47: / byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun //
T02TD1509E:279b-48: thig le'i tshul te rang sgra sgrogs //
T02TD1509E:279b-49: 'jig rten kun gyi rtsa ba ste //
T02TD1509E:279b-50: brtan dang g-yo ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1509E:279b-51: gnas pa sa bon tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1509E:279b-52: gsal dang mi gsal tshul gyis te //
T02TD1509E:279b-53: 'dzag pa bdud rtsi'i tshul nyid kyis //
T02TD1509E:280a-2: ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba'i //
T02TD1509E:280a-3: sangs rgyas nyid ni mdor bsdus nas //
T02TD1509E:280a-4: sangs rgyas sbyor ba yod min na //
T02TD1509E:280a-6: de phyir bden dang mi bden yang //
T02TD1509E:280a-7: gang gang shin tu goms gyur pa //
T02TD1509E:280a-8: goms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na //
T02TD1509E:280a-9: de gsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu //
T02TD1509E:280a-10: bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni //
T02TD1509E:280a-11: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1509E:280a-12: de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur //
T02TD1509E:280a-13: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02TD1509E:280a-14: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas ni //
T02TD1509E:280a-15: yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo las //
T02TD1509E:280a-16: mtho ris mi yul sa 'og gi / skad cig gcig gis sku gcig 'gyur //
T02TD1509E:280a-17: skad cig tsam gyis rnal 'byor bdag / skad cig phyag rgya'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1509E:280a-19: skad cig gis ni gsang sngags gdon //
T02TD1509E:280a-20: dbang bskur sku gsung thugs rgyas gdab //
T02TD1509E:280a-21: aom a'a: h'um sarba b'i ra yo ga n'i k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1509E:280a-22: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham /
T02TD1509E:280a-23: de nas go cha gnyis shes nas //
T02TD1509E:280a-24: ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1509E:280a-25: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor shes pas //
T02TD1509E:280a-26: dam tshig 'khor lo la myur gzhug / aom ha rdo rje sems dpa' dkar //
T02TD1509E:280a-27: go cha gnyis kyang snying ga ru //
T02TD1509E:280a-28: rnam par snang mdzad na ma hi //
T02TD1509E:280a-29: mgo la ser po rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1509E:280a-30: sv'a h'a hu pad gar dbang phyug / spyi gzug tu ni dmar po bsgom //
T02TD1509E:280a-31: boo sha ta ha ni phrag dag la //
T02TD1509E:280a-32: dpal he tu ga nag po gnyis //
T02TD1509E:280a-33: rdo rje nyi ma h'um h'um ho //
T02TD1509E:280a-34: mig gnyis la ni dmar po bsam //
T02TD1509E:280a-35: ljang gu tshigs pa thams cad la //
T02TD1509E:280a-36: phat h'am mtshan ma rta mchog go //
T02TD1509E:280a-37: dpa' bo rnams la 'di kho na'i //
T02TD1509E:280a-38: yan lag drug po yongs su bsgom //
T02TD1509E:280a-39: aom bam rdo rje pag mo sta //
T02TD1509E:280a-40: lta bar dmar po bsam par bya //
T02TD1509E:280a-41: snying gar ham aom ya mi ni //
T02TD1509E:280a-42: hrim mom kha ru rmongs byed ma //
T02TD1509E:280a-43: hrem hrim dpral bar skyed byed ma //
T02TD1509E:280a-44: h'um h'um skrag byed spyi gtsug tu //
T02TD1509E:280a-45: phat phat lus tshigs thams cad la //
T02TD1509E:280a-46: mtshon cha gtum mo 'di dag mdog / sngon mo dkar mo ser mo ljang //
T02TD1509E:280a-47: du mdog dpa' bo rnams la yang //
T02TD1509E:280a-48: lag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyang //
T02TD1509E:280a-50: rkang g-yas g-yon gyis mnan nas ni //
T02TD1509E:280b-0: g-yon mig cung @280b dma' gyen du blta //
T02TD1509E:280b-1: lag gnyis mthe brtse thur bltas te //
T02TD1509E:280b-2: yang dag mnan nas sdigs mdzub gnyis //
T02TD1509E:280b-3: lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par bcings //
T02TD1509E:280b-4: gung mo gnyis ni sprad byas te //
T02TD1509E:280b-5: lhag ma brkyang nas mgo steng du //
T02TD1509E:280b-6: g-yon dang g-yas su bskor bar bya //
T02TD1509E:280b-8: pheem yig brjod pa dang bcas pas //
T02TD1509E:280b-9: snying gar nyi gnas ting 'dzin sems //
T02TD1509E:280b-10: h'um yig 'od zer gyis bkug pa //
T02TD1509E:280b-11: ye shes 'khor lo pi wang sogs //
T02TD1509E:280b-12: mchod nas bdag la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1509E:280b-13: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02TD1509E:280b-14: gsang sngags brjod cing pad kor gyis //
T02TD1509E:280b-15: 'khyud pa'i stangs kyis mnyes par bya //
T02TD1509E:280b-16: ye shes dus mnyam byon pa yis //
T02TD1509E:280b-17: spyan sogs da ma ru dang ni //
T02TD1509E:280b-18: bdud rtsi'i thod pa thogs nas su //
T02TD1509E:280b-19: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD1509E:280b-20: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD1509E:280b-21: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1509E:280b-22: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02TD1509E:280b-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD1509E:280b-24: brjod cing bdud rtsi snod thogs kyis //
T02TD1509E:280b-25: dbang bskur bas ni dgyes par bsam //
T02TD1509E:280b-26: bdud rtsi'i lhag ma las byung ba'i //
T02TD1509E:280b-27: rgyal bas de rjes rgyas gdab bya //
T02TD1509E:280b-28: bde mchog spyi gtsug mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1509E:280b-29: phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1509E:280b-31: thugs 'khor gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1509E:280b-33: sku yi 'khor lo rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1509E:280b-34: dam tshig tu ni don yod grub //
T02TD1509E:280b-35: bdud rtsi ro mas drangs gsol nas //
T02TD1509E:280b-36: rab dgyes rkang pa brgyad pas bstod //
T02TD1509E:280b-37: ye shes lnga dang sku gsung nyid //
T02TD1509E:280b-38: gzugs brnyan bzhin du lhag par mos //
T02TD1509E:280b-39: de nas rang gi ston pa mchod //
T02TD1509E:280b-40: de la gsang sngags 'di lta ste //
T02TD1509E:280b-41: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat //
T02TD1509E:280b-42: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD1509E:280b-44: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:280b-45: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02TD1509E:280b-46: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1509E:280b-47: lha mo'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02TD1509E:280b-48: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna ni ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1509E:280b-49: lha mo'i nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD1509E:280b-50: aom ka nra ka ra khanda k'a pa la pra tsande h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:280b-51: aom ku ru ku ru ma h'a kam ka la tsanda aakshi ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:280b-52: aom bandha bandhya kam ka la prabha ba t'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-1: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya mi ka ta damshtra ni ma h'a na seh'a na se h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-2: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya su ra bee ri na b'i ram ti ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-3: aom hroom hroom aa mi t'a bha kharba r'a ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-4: aom hra: hra: badzra pra bha ba lam ke shva r'i ye h'um h'um phat //
T02TD1509E:281a-5: aom phem phem badzra k'a ya dru matstsha ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-6: aom phat phat aom ku ri ka aee ra wa t'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-7: aom da ha da ha badzra dz'a ti la ma h'a bhee ra b'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-8: aom pa tsa pha tsam h'a b'i re b'a yu be ge h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-9: aom bhaksha bhaksha ru dhi r'antra ma l'a ba la mbi ni badzra h'um ka ra sur bhaksha ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-10: aom gri hna sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam gam sarba ta rdzdza ya su bha dre shy'a ma de w'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-11: aom a'a kaddhya a'a gaddhya badzra bha dra su bha dre h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-12: aom hrim hrim ma h'a bhee ra ba ha ya ka rne h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-13: aom dznoom dznoom bi r'u p'a ksha kha g'a na ne h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-14: aom kshmam kshmam ma h'a ba la tsakra be ge h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-15: aom h'am h'am h'am ratna badzra khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-16: aom h'im h'im ha ya gr'i ba shoond'i n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-17: aom h'um h'um a'a k'a sha garbha tsakra barmmi ni ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-18: aom ki li ki li shr'i he ru ka su b'i ri h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-19: aom si li si li padma na rtte shva ra ma h'a ba le h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-20: aom hi li hi li bee ro tsa kra wa rtti ni ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-21: aom dhi li dhi li badzra satva ma h'a b'i ra ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-22: aom k'a ka sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-23: aom au lu k'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-24: aom shva n'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-25: aom shu ka r'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-26: aom ya ma da dh'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-27: aom ya ma d'u t'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-28: aom ya ma dam shti ni ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-29: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-30: aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-31: aom l'a m'a ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-32: ao khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-33: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-34: aom bo dhi tsitta badzra ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-35: aom na mobha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-36: aom ma h'a ka lp'a gni sanni bh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-37: aom dz'a ta mu ku totka t'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-38: aom damsht'a ka r'a lo gra bhi sha na mu kh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-39: aom sa ha sra bhu dza bha su r'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-40: aom par shu p'a sho dy'a ta sh'u la kha tv'am ga dha ri ne ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-41: aom by'a ghra dzi n'am ba ra dha r'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-42: aom ma h'a dhu mbr'a ndha ka ra wa pu sh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1509E:281a-43: de dag ni mchod pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1509E:281a-44: khanda ka p'a so sen mor //
T02TD1509E:281a-45: skra spu ma h'a kangka la //
T02TD1509E:281a-46: pags dang dri mar kangka la //
T02TD1509E:281a-47: sha al mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
T02TD1509E:281a-48: su ra bee ri rgyus pa la //
T02TD1509E:281a-49: 'od dpag med pa rus pa la'o //
T02TD1509E:281a-50: mchin pa la ni rdo rje 'od //
T02TD1509E:281a-51: snying la rdo rje sku gnas te //
T02TD1509E:281b-0: mig dag la ni @281b aangku ri //
T02TD1509E:281b-1: rdo rje'i ral ldan mkhris pa la //
T02TD1509E:281b-2: dpa' bo chen po glo bar bzhugs //
T02TD1509E:281b-3: rgyu mar rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD1509E:281b-4: rab tu bzang mo gnye ma la /
T02TD1509E:281b-5: rdo rje bzang mo grod par gnas //
T02TD1509E:281b-6: 'jigs byed chen po bshad ba la'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-7: smin mtshams la ni mig mi bzang //
T02TD1509E:281b-8: bad kan la ni stobs po che //
T02TD1509E:281b-9: rnag rnams rin chen rdo rje'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-10: dpa' bo rta mgrin khrag la'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-11: rdul la nam mkha'i snying po gnas //
T02TD1509E:281b-12: tshil la dpal ldan he ru ka / mchi ma padma gar dbang phyug / mchil ma la ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1509E:281b-13: snabs la rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02TD1509E:281b-14: de ltar dpa' bo lus la bzhugs //
T02TD1509E:281b-15: phreng ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo ni //
T02TD1509E:281b-16: tshangs skud la sogs brtag pa'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-17: dpa' po nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
T02TD1509E:281b-18: lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag / go cha'i dpa' bo drug gis kyang //
T02TD1509E:281b-19: phyag rgya drug gis lus mdzes te //
T02TD1509E:281b-20: phag mo'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis su //
T02TD1509E:281b-21: mgul rgyan phyag rgya'i dag pa'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-22: mgon po'i snying po'i sngags kyis kyang //
T02TD1509E:281b-23: mgo bo'i phreng ba brgya yi phyed //
T02TD1509E:281b-24: gsang sngags yi ge bdun gyis ni //
T02TD1509E:281b-25: rna cha yis ni rna ba mdzes //
T02TD1509E:281b-27: pags pa'i sham thabs dag pa'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-28: go cha'i lha mo drug gis ni //
T02TD1509E:281b-29: ske rags rgyan gyi dag pa'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-30: 'khor lo lnga gnas lha mo yi //
T02TD1509E:281b-31: sngags kyis btung ba'i thod pa'o //
T02TD1509E:281b-32: bee ro tsa na'i sngags kyis kyang //
T02TD1509E:281b-33: thod pas dbu la rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1509E:281b-34: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
T02TD1509E:281b-35: 'khor lo sdom pa'i bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1509E:281b-36: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin phyir //
T02TD1509E:281b-37: shes rab da ma ru yi sgra //
T02TD1509E:281b-38: dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir //
T02TD1509E:281b-39: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyin mor brjod //
T02TD1509E:281b-40: de yi dngos med rang bzhin phyir //
T02TD1509E:281b-41: rnal 'byor ma ni mtshan mor bshad //
T02TD1509E:281b-42: ji ltar bar do'i sems 'byung ba //
T02TD1509E:281b-43: shes pa tsam de nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1509E:281b-44: mngon shes lnga ldan de bzhin tshul //
T02TD1509E:281b-45: rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshan dpes spras //
T02TD1509E:281b-46: stong nyid chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02TD1509E:281b-47: phag mo zhes byar rab tu bstan //
T02TD1509E:281b-48: shr'i yig gnyis med ye shes te //
T02TD1509E:281b-49: he zhes rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02TD1509E:281b-50: ru yig rnam rtog tshogs dang bral //
T02TD1509E:281b-51: ka zhes gang du'ang mi gnas so //
T02TD1509E:281b-52: ngag yul min pa b'a yi sgra //
T02TD1509E:281b-53: r'a yig rnam pa rnams spangs pa //
T02TD1509E:282a-2: phag mo'i sgrar ni grags pa'o //
T02TD1509E:282a-3: byang chub phyogs kyi rab sbyor gyis //
T02TD1509E:282a-4: thams cad shes pa nyid rab bstan //
T02TD1509E:282a-5: sa dang gnas sogs sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1509E:282a-6: 'gro ba'i bla ma lam shes nyid //
T02TD1509E:282a-7: go cha la sogs rnam dag mthas //
T02TD1509E:282a-8: rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid kyang ngo //
T02TD1509E:282a-9: go cha gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1509E:282a-10: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas //
T02TD1509E:282a-11: sumbha sogs kyis srung byas te //
T02TD1509E:282a-12: rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod par bya //
T02TD1509E:282a-13: rtag tu sems can thams cad la //
T02TD1509E:282a-14: sdom pa nyid du blta bar bya la //
T02TD1509E:282a-15: rkang pa brgyad kyis rab bstod de //
T02TD1509E:282a-16: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs nas ;
T02TD1509E:282a-17: / rnal 'byor blo chen rnam par spyod //
T02TD1509E:282a-18: khams gsum dang ni dbyer med bdag / rigs lnga dag tu kun spyod pa //
T02TD1509E:282a-19: de rnams ro gcig nyid phyir ro //
T02TD1509E:282a-20: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems //
T02TD1509E:282a-21: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga longs spyod //
T02TD1509E:282a-22: dogs pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
T02TD1509E:282a-23: rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod //
T02TD1509E:282a-24: ces bya ba ni shin tu rnal 'byor te gsum pa'o //
T02TD1509E:282a-25: a'a li k'a li 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa ni //
T02TD1509E:282a-26: yang dag bkod cing 'khor lo gsum ni spros nas de //
T02TD1509E:282a-27: sna yi bu ga g-yas pa'i rlung dang bcas nas su //
T02TD1509E:282a-28: byung nas 'jig rten thams cad 'khor lo gsum gyur te //
T02TD1509E:282a-29: de nas sna bug g-yon pa'i rlung gi shugs las ni //
T02TD1509E:282a-30: rab tu zhugs nas lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1509E:282a-31: de yi steng du skad cig h'um yig bsam byas nas //
T02TD1509E:282a-32: de dag yongs su gyur nas srid pa'i dbang phyug ni //
T02TD1509E:282a-33: mdog dkar zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams //
T02TD1509E:282a-34: rten med 'ja' tshon ri mo bzhin du blta bar bya //
T02TD1509E:282a-35: rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo dang bcas pa //
T02TD1509E:282a-36: sgyu ma'i dga' ba de sgras 'gro ba ma lus bkug / srid dang dur khrod srung ba sku gsung thugs dang ni //
T02TD1509E:282a-37: bde ba chen po yab yum lte bar gnas pa dang //
T02TD1509E:282a-38: bde bas zhu ba las khyung dkar dmar h'um a'u ha //
T02TD1509E:282a-39: mgo dang zla chos thig la n'a da rab tu thim //
T02TD1509E:282a-40: n'a da tsam yang spangs nas su //
T02TD1509E:282a-41: bsam gyis mi khyab rtog pa'ang spangs //
T02TD1509E:282a-42: de las gzungs ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD1509E:282a-43: des ni rim pas thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1509E:282a-44: zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po ste bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1509E:282b-0: de nas myur bar yid kyis dkyil 'khor mos @282b nas ni //
T02TD1509E:282b-1: n'a da dkar dmar mdog ldan rang gi lte bar bsgom //
T02TD1509E:282b-2: de nas yi ge gsum pa yang dag rjod byed cing //
T02TD1509E:282b-3: n'a da las ni 'thon nas 'gro ba'i don byas te //
T02TD1509E:282b-4: de nas 'khor lo'i lha rnams rlung dang bcas nas su //
T02TD1509E:282b-5: slar yang phyi nas nang du zhugs nas de bzhin yang //
T02TD1509E:282b-6: bla ma dam pa'i gdams pas yang dang yang du ste //
T02TD1509E:282b-7: skyo bar gyur na rdo rje'i bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1509E:282b-8: snying po nye ba'i snying po'i sngags //
T02TD1509E:282b-9: n'a da 'khor lo'i lha tshogs kyi //
T02TD1509E:282b-10: spro dang bsdu ba dag gis ni //
T02TD1509E:282b-11: de bzhin blo ldan dam tshig bzlas //
T02TD1509E:282b-12: chos rnams mnyam nyid nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD1509E:282b-13: phreng sngags rang gi khar zhugs te //
T02TD1509E:282b-14: rdo rje'i lam nas bha gar zhugs //
T02TD1509E:282b-15: dbu mar zhugs nas kha ru thon //
T02TD1509E:282b-16: lha mo las byung kha ru zhugs //
T02TD1509E:282b-18: rang lus 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rab tu bsam byas nas //
T02TD1509E:282b-19: yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs gtor ma phul nas su //
T02TD1509E:282b-20: 'bar ba sogs kyis bza' ba'i zas ni dag par bya //
T02TD1509E:282b-21: chos la mnyam nyid nga rgyal ldan pas sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1509E:282b-22: aom sa ma ya shuddha : sarba dharm'a: sa ma ya shuddho& ham /
T02TD1509E:282b-23: aom aa mri to da ka h'um h'um tha tha tram aam kham h'um h'um gis rdo rje dkar po'i rang bzhin ljags byas nas //
T02TD1509E:282b-24: yi ge gsum gyis n'a da dgyes par mdzad cing gsol //
T02TD1509E:282b-25: nyin phyed skad cig dkyil 'khor mos //
T02TD1509E:282b-26: cho ga sngar bzhin byas nas spyad //
T02TD1509E:282b-27: mtshan phyed na yang de bzhin bya //
T02TD1509E:282b-28: rang smra a'a li k'a lir rtogs //
T02TD1509E:282b-29: spyon spyon dpa' bo chen po kye //
T02TD1509E:282b-30: dag pa'i tshig ni ston pa po //
T02TD1509E:282b-31: stong nyid ye shes kho na 'di //
T02TD1509E:282b-33: a'a li la sogs ksha yi bar //
T02TD1509E:282b-34: h'um h'um phat dang yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1509E:282b-35: aom sv'a sogs pa'i sngags brjod de //
T02TD1509E:282b-36: 'od gsal mngon du phyogs nas su //
T02TD1509E:282b-37: nyal bya thun mtshams thams cad du //
T02TD1509E:282b-38: tha mar yi ge brgya pa brjod //
T02TD1509E:282b-40: sems nyid dub pa'i ngal so tsam //
T02TD1509E:282b-41: 'chi ba de nyid kho nar med //
T02TD1509E:282b-42: 'jig rten rnam rtog yin phyir ro //
T02TD1509E:282b-44: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
T02TD1509E:282b-45: sna tshogs mchod pa lag thogs te //
T02TD1509E:282b-48: yam dang ram las byung ba'i rlung dang me bsams te /
T02TD1509E:283a-0: mgo gsum thab la aa las byung ba'i @283a * //
T02TD1509E:283a-2: zan sogs sngags kyis byin brlabs sgron ma lnga dang ni //
T02TD1509E:283a-3: bdud rtsi lngar mos rlung g-yas mes zhu dmar ba'i mdog / aom tr'am aam kham h'um lam m'am pam t'am bam /
T02TD1509E:283a-4: h'um byung bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin thur bstan kha tv'am gas //
T02TD1509E:283a-5: dkrugs pas de yang zhu nas kha ba lta bur bsam /
T02TD1509E:283a-6: a'a li k'a li las byung yi ge gsum las 'thon //
T02TD1509E:283a-7: 'khor lo gsum gyis sngar bzhin skye bo'i don byas nas //
T02TD1509E:283a-8: rgya mtsho la sogs gnas nas bdud rtsi bkug byas te //
T02TD1509E:283a-9: snyoms par zhugs pas zhu nas 'khor lo gsum gyi lha //
T02TD1509E:283a-10: rim pa bzhin du yi ge gsum la rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1509E:283a-11: aom sogs rim thim yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1509E:283a-12: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya pheem sngags kyi //
T02TD1509E:283a-13: mdun du 'khor lo spyan drangs nas //
T02TD1509E:283a-14: aargham sogs kyis mchod nas su //
T02TD1509E:283a-15: a'a li k'a li yongs gyur te //
T02TD1509E:283a-16: g-yon dang g-yas ba'i lag pa gnyis //
T02TD1509E:283a-17: zla ba nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyur //
T02TD1509E:283a-18: de yi nang du h'um yig ni //
T02TD1509E:283a-19: sngags 'di brjod cing bsgom par bya //
T02TD1509E:283a-20: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga t'a sarba dharm'a :pa ra spar aa nu pra bashti sarba dharm'a: aatya nt'a nu pra bashti sarbadharm'a h'um /
T02TD1509E:283a-21: zla ba la sogs yongs gyur pas //
T02TD1509E:283a-22: lag gnyis rdo rje thal mo la //
T02TD1509E:283a-23: bdud rtsi'i thod pa bzhag nas sam //
T02TD1509E:283a-24: yang na lag par bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1509E:283a-25: lha mo rnams ni tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02TD1509E:283a-26: de gsung tshig rnams kyang ni mchod tu tshad ma ste //
T02TD1509E:283a-27: bden pa 'di dag gis ni lha mo 'di rnams kyis //
T02TD1509E:283a-28: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur ni 'gyur bar shog / ces brjod mchod par bya ba sogs //
T02TD1509E:283a-29: dbyer med dmigs shing bdud rtsi'i snod //
T02TD1509E:283a-30: shar phyogs la sogs g-yon du ste //
T02TD1509E:283a-31: mtshams su g-yas kyis bskor bya ste //
T02TD1509E:283a-32: aom ka ra la sogs sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1509E:283a-33: h'um byung dkar po'i ljags byas pa'i //
T02TD1509E:283a-34: 'khor lo gsum gyi lha rnams la //
T02TD1509E:283a-35: rnal 'byor ldan pas gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1509E:283a-39: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
T02TD1509E:283a-40: ksho bha ya ksho bha ya /
T02TD1509E:283a-48: ba sa ru dhi r'a ntra m'a l'a ba l'a mbi ne /
T02TD1509E:283a-50: sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam gam sarba mb'a /
T02TD1509E:283a-51: tardza ya ta rdza ya ta rdza ya /
T02TD1509E:283b-6: rnam pa du mar de bzhag la //
T02TD1509E:283b-9: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho: //
T02TD1509E:283b-10: pi wang sogs kyis mchod byin nas //
T02TD1509E:283b-11: zhal bsil la sogs byas nas su //
T02TD1509E:283b-12: srid dang zhi ba mnyam par sbyor gyur kun rtog rlabs bcom pa //
T02TD1509E:283b-13: nam mkha'i rang bzhin dngos po mtha' dag de nyid kho nar gzigs //
T02TD1509E:283b-14: shin tu phul byung thugs rje'i chu rgyas sems kyi chu bo'i mgon //
T02TD1509E:283b-15: lha mo rnams kyis bdag la shin tu brtse bar mdzad mdzod cig / ces bstod mngon par 'dod don gsol //
T02TD1509E:283b-16: phyogs bdag sogs gtor de bzhin du //
T02TD1509E:283b-17: aom kha la sogs sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1509E:283b-18: gnyis sam gsum gyis bstab par bya //
T02TD1509E:283b-19: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a ti sarba yaksha raksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsonma d'a paspma ra d'a ka d'a ki n+y'a da ya ai mam ba lim gri hna ntu /
T02TD1509E:283b-20: sa ma ya rakshantu ma ma sarba siddhi pram yatstsha ntu /
T02TD1509E:283b-21: ya thee bam ya tham shtam /
T02TD1509E:283b-22: bhu nydza tha pi pa dzi ghra tha m'a tikra ma th'a /
T02TD1509E:283b-23: ma ma sarba k'a rta ya sat su kham phi brid dha ye sa h'a yi ka bha bantu h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1509E:283b-24: gtor ma gsol nas de rnams ni //
T02TD1509E:283b-25: bde ba chen po ldan par bsam //
T02TD1509E:283b-26: pi wang ma sogs rnams kyis mchod //
T02TD1509E:283b-27: go la la sogs dbul ba dang //
T02TD1509E:283b-28: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis bstod //
T02TD1509E:283b-29: de nas 'dod don gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1509E:283b-30: tstsho ma'i lag pas se gol gtogs //
T02TD1509E:283b-31: chad lhag bskang bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1509E:283b-32: gsang sngags yi ge brgya pa brjod //
T02TD1509E:283b-33: dril bu dkrol ba sngon btang nas //
T02TD1509E:283b-34: pad kor phyag rgyal dgyes par bya ;
T02TD1509E:283b-35: / aom yo ga la sogs sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1509E:283b-36: nam mkha' lta bu'i dngos po nyid //
T02TD1509E:283b-37: mngon par 'khyud pa'i stangs byas nas //
T02TD1509E:283b-38: srin lag mthe bong se gol gtogs //
T02TD1509E:283b-39: aom badzra mu: zhes byas nas su //
T02TD1509E:283b-40: rang la 'khor lo gzhug par bya //
T02TD1509E:283b-41: gtor ma'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1509E:283b-42: snga dro yang dag langs la sa phyogs gtsang ma ru /
T02TD1509E:283b-43: su mbha la sogs gsang sngags brjod cing rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1509E:283b-44: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byugs nas su //
T02TD1509E:283b-45: p'u dza la sogs gnas sogs brjod cing rim pa yis //
T02TD1509E:283b-46: aom p'i tha au pa p'i tha /
T02TD1509E:283b-47: kshe tra au pa kshe tra /
T02TD1509E:284a-0: @284a * // tshando ha au pa tshando ha /
T02TD1509E:284a-1: me l'a p'a ka au pame l'a p'a ka / shma sh'a n'a au pa shma sh'a na /
T02TD1509E:284a-2: de nas skad cig 'byung bzhi ri rab padma la /
T02TD1509E:284a-3: h'um gzhag de yi 'od zer gyis ni rab bkug pa //
T02TD1509E:284a-4: de la ye shes 'khor lo rjes su bcu gnas su //
T02TD1509E:284a-5: de nyid yongs su gyur nas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta //
T02TD1509E:284a-6: snying ga'i sa bon las byung pi wang ma sogs kyis mchod dang //
T02TD1509E:284a-7: rin chen bdun po phul nas dag par byas pa yis //
T02TD1509E:284a-8: g-yon pas mngon du yi ge gsum gyis me tog dbul //
T02TD1509E:284a-9: de nas lha dang lha mo'i snying po la sogs kyis //
T02TD1509E:284a-10: de yi 'khor lo rang rang cho ga rab brjod nas //
T02TD1509E:284a-11: mtshams su g-yas su bskor zhing phyogs rnams g-yon du bskor //
T02TD1509E:284a-12: de nas lag par gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs sogs la //
T02TD1509E:284a-13: aom ha la sogs sngags kyis me tog phul nas ni //
T02TD1509E:284a-14: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis g-yon pa'i me tog ni //
T02TD1509E:284a-15: 'khor lor dor nas mgo la thal mo sbyar nas des //
T02TD1509E:284a-16: rang la g-yon pa'i 'khor lo rab tu gzhug par bya //
T02TD1509E:284a-17: rkang pa brgyad pas bstod nas sdig pa bshags sogs dang //
T02TD1509E:284a-18: smon lam gdab dang bzlas brjod yi ge brgya pa dang //
T02TD1509E:284a-19: aom yo ga la sogs sngags dang pad kor phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1509E:284a-20: dgyes par byas te mngon par 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1509E:284a-21: sa reg tsho da ka dang badzra mu: zhes pa //
T02TD1509E:284a-22: brjod cing bdag la 'khor lo thams cad rab bcug nas //
T02TD1509E:284a-23: de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor ri mo bsrub par bya //
T02TD1509E:284a-24: phyi rol gyi mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1509E:284a-25: mthe bo mdzu ba mo gung mo dang //
T02TD1509E:284a-26: srin lag mthe chung de rnams khar //
T02TD1509E:284a-27: g-yon par rdo rje can rnam snang //
T02TD1509E:284a-28: rdo rje sems dang rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1509E:284a-29: 'od dpag med dang mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1509E:284a-30: rin 'byung don grub go rims bzhin //
T02TD1509E:284a-31: dkar ser dmar dang mthing ga dang //
T02TD1509E:284a-32: dmar ser ljang gu'i kha dog ldan //
T02TD1509E:284a-33: aom ha la sogs byung ba ste //
T02TD1509E:284a-34: zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje can //
T02TD1509E:284a-35: gzhan rnams zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1509E:284a-36: g-yas pa rdo rje rde'u chung mgo //
T02TD1509E:284a-37: dril bu thod pa kha tv'am ga / g-yon du'o rdo rje can gyi zhal //
T02TD1509E:284a-38: dkar dang dmar dang mthing ga'o //
T02TD1509E:284a-39: dbus dang g-yas g-yon rim bzhin no //
T02TD1509E:284a-40: gzhan pa rnams kyi mtshon char brjod //
T02TD1509E:284b-0: ral gri gzhan @284b kun da ma ru'o //
T02TD1509E:284b-1: dril bu thod bcas kha tv'am ga / g-yas dang g-yon du go rims bzhin //
T02TD1509E:284b-3: dmar po 'dab ma g-yon skor sbyar //
T02TD1509E:284b-4: lte bar phag mo sku mdog dmar //
T02TD1509E:284b-6: dmar po mthil ga ljang gu'i zhal //
T02TD1509E:284b-7: thod pa kha tv'am zhags pa g-yon //
T02TD1509E:284b-8: lcags kyu tshangs mgo gri gug g-yas //
T02TD1509E:284b-9: ya mi ni dang rmongs byed ma //
T02TD1509E:284b-10: skyod byed ma dang skrag byed ma //
T02TD1509E:284b-11: gtum mo mthing ga dkar ser mo //
T02TD1509E:284b-12: ljang gu du ba'i mdog can rnams //
T02TD1509E:284b-13: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T02TD1509E:284b-14: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1509E:284b-15: thams cad spyan gsum skra grol ma //
T02TD1509E:284b-16: gcer bu phyag bzhi lha mo rnams //
T02TD1509E:284b-17: g-yon na thod pa kha tv'am ga / phyag bzhan na ni dril bu bsnams //
T02TD1509E:284b-18: g-yas su rnge'u chung gri gug go //
T02TD1509E:284b-19: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gnas pa rnams //
T02TD1509E:284b-20: dkar po gang de zla bar gnas //
T02TD1509E:284b-21: de gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la'o //
T02TD1509E:284b-22: yang na 'di rnams sa bon nyid //
T02TD1509E:284b-23: dang por brjod pa'i rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1509E:284b-24: de yi mdog dang rang bzhin can //
T02TD1509E:284b-25: sngags dang lha gnyis khyad med phyir //
T02TD1509E:284b-27: lag pa'i rgyab tu bsam par bya //
T02TD1509E:284b-28: de nas lag pa'i sa bon rnams //
T02TD1509E:284b-29: zhu ba'i rdzas kyis gdab byas nas //
T02TD1509E:284b-30: 'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin bsam //
T02TD1509E:284b-31: rdo rje'i 'dzin pas byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1509E:284b-32: 'di la rdzas ni rkang brgyad kyis //
T02TD1509E:284b-33: dbul ba'am yi ge gsum gyis so //
T02TD1509E:284b-34: cho ga lhag chad dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1509E:284b-35: gsang sngags yi ge brgya pa brjod //
T02TD1509E:284b-36: 'khor lo'i mgon po la gsol nas //
T02TD1509E:284b-37: rdzas de snod kyi nang du gzhug ; lag pa la yod rdzas rnams ni //
T02TD1509E:284b-38: g-yon pa'i srin lag gis reg nas //
T02TD1509E:284b-39: snying ga lte dang dpral ba ru //
T02TD1509E:284b-40: h'um a'a: aom gyi sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1509E:284b-41: byugs nas lha yi tshogs rnams ni //
T02TD1509E:284b-42: bdag la rab tu bstim par bya //
T02TD1509E:284b-43: lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1509E:284b-44: h'um yig dkar po las byung rdo rje'i rang bzhin ljags //
T02TD1509E:284b-45: g-yas pa dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis ni blugs pa gang //
T02TD1509E:284b-46: lte ba'i padma rab tu 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ru //
T02TD1509E:284b-47: de ni bza' ba'i dus kyi nang gi sbyin sreg go //
T02TD1509E:284b-48: aom a'a:au tstshishta badzra aa dhi ti shtha ai mam ba lim h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1509E:285a-0: zhes bya ba 'dis zos pa'i lhag ma'i @285a * //
T02TD1509E:285a-2: bdag nyid chen po'i khams kyi zam tog 'di thun mong rnams kyis gzhal bar mi nu ste /
T02TD1509E:285a-3: de phyir 'di la kho bos kyang ni rab tu 'jug par nus par 'gyur ba ma yin mod //
T02TD1509E:285a-4: 'on kyang rnal 'byor dbang phyug l'u yi'i gsung tshig lhug gzung dka' bas goms phyir bzod ma gyur //
T02TD1509E:285a-5: de yi lam gyi rdzes su 'gro bar 'dod pas 'di la gnas pa'i tshig bcad bdag gis byas //
T02TD1509E:285a-6: mtshungs pa med pa yon tan phung po dang po'i mgon po ston pa yi //
T02TD1509E:285a-7: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi don ni rtsod pa'i snyigs ma sel byed bshad pa las //
T02TD1509E:285a-8: mtha' yas dri med bsod nams gang des 'jig rten sangs rgyas nyid gyur dang //
T02TD1509E:285a-9: bdag kyang 'gro ba'i don sgrub byed cing 'gro ba gnas par gnas gyur cig / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bu dpal ldan l'u yi bas mdzad pa //
T02TD1509E:285a-10: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba bla ma pandi ta chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1509E:285a-12: // / rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta li'i pandi ta chen po bi bh'u ti tsandras bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po rir sgra rang bsgyur du mdzad pa'o//
